name: iAbrasive.com
overview:
www.iabrasive.com is an international business to business portal for abrasive business. For abrasives manufacturers, you can display as many as 100 products without paying for it on this portal. For abrasives distributors, you can fine your ideal business partners here within limited time once you become the member of the portal. This portal is going to be the innovation in the field of abrasives for its professional team and creative spirits. Abrasives is a small but indispensable industry, which is honored as teeth of any other industries in China. There are so many products can be involved in abrasives industry, such as grinding wheels, cut-off wheels, sanding cloth, sanding paper, diamond saw blades, abrasive files, abrasive brushes, abrasive compounds and so on, which we can named them. In fact, common uses for abrasives include grinding, polishing, buffing, honing, cutting, drilling, sharpening, lapping, and sanding. We can imagine that there are over 100,000 different abrasive and abrasive products all over the world. iAbrasive.com is proud to be a platform, where let these products showing up.

In order to make iAbrasive.com platform more customer-friendly, this team has succeeded in finishing the categories of abrasives, after studying the products and learning from those feedback of some kind visitors of this platform. The first-class category includes:abrasive grains, bonded abrasives, coated abrasives, non-woven abrasives, buffing & polishing , superhard materials, super abrasives, diamond tools, wire brushes, carbide burrs, sand blasters & media, mass finishing &media, machines&power tools, safety products and other. Of course, these categories should be updated according to our users’ feedback. They are divided for the moment. Therefore, you are warm welcome to give your feedback to us to make this platform much closer to our users.
